item.title: 右翼民粹主义崛起威胁日本的避风港地位
item.description:
由于通货膨胀加剧了年轻选民的不满情绪，执政党正逐渐落后于反对党。【原文：

The ruling party is losing ground to opposition parties as inflation fuels discontent among young voters.   

】

item.title: 加密货币的新币季蹒跚起步
item.description: 沈慕尧审视了加密货币市场上反复出现的一种现象，即所谓的 "另类币季节"。【原文：Muyao Shen takes a look at a recurring phenomenon in crypto markets that’s become known as altcoin season.】

item.title: 金价反弹，纽蒙特削减成本助力盈利增长
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）在控制成本方面取得了进展，在贵金属反弹支撑整个行业之际，帮助这家世界顶级金矿公司实现了超出预期的盈利。【原文：Newmont Corp. has made progress getting its costs under control, helping the world’s top gold miner beat expectations on earnings at a time when a rally for the precious metal is underpinning the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大将养老基金的财务实力作为与美国贸易谈判的筹码
item.description: 加拿大内阁一位高级部长表示，在加拿大寻求与特朗普政府谈判贸易协定之际，加拿大的主要养老基金可能会增加在美国的投资。【原文：Canada’s major pension funds could boost their investments in the US, a top Canadian cabinet minister said, as the country looks to negotiate a trade agreement with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 彭妮-普利兹克警告特朗普削减开支威胁美国在全球科技竞争中的地位
item.description: 美国前商务部长、哈佛大学强大的管理机构主席彭妮-普利兹克（Penny Pritzker）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统削减科研经费的做法正使美国面临在与包括中国在内的其他国家的技术竞争中败下阵来的风险。【原文：President Donald Trump’s cuts to research funding are putting the US at risk of losing the technological race against other countries including China, said Penny Pritzker, former US commerce secretary and chair of Harvard University’s powerful governing body.】

item.title: 个人电脑需求回升，英特尔发布乐观销售预测
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.）给出的本期收入预期强于预期，为投资者在新任首席执行官陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）领导下等待转机带来了一线希望。【原文：Intel Corp. gave a stronger-than-anticipated revenue forecast for the current period, offering investors a glimmer of hope as they wait for a turnaround under new Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan.】

item.title: 特朗普从硅谷的愿望清单中直接提取人工智能行动计划
item.description: 特朗普新公布的人工智能计划赢得了科技行业的赞誉。但首先...【原文：Trump’s newly unveiled AI plan is winning praise from the tech industry. But first…】

item.title: 澳大利亚小麦前景虽有降雨但改善甚微
item.description: 尽管主要产区降雨量增加，但澳大利亚本季小麦收成仍将减少，这对中国等买家来说是一个打击，因为长期干旱之后，中国可能需要更多进口。【原文：Australia remains on track for a smaller wheat crop this season despite better rainfall in key growing regions, a blow to buyers such as China which may need more imports following a lengthy drought.】

item.title: 为什么 "备忘录股票 "狂热不断？
item.description: 金融市场再次被 "备忘录股票 "狂热所俘获。7 月中旬，在社交媒体的热议和散户投资者突然大举买入的推动下，包括 Opendoor Technologies Inc.、Kohl's Corp. 和 Krispy Kreme Inc.【原文：Financial markets once again have been seized by meme-stock mania. In mid-July, a frenzied rally erupted around a cohort of beaten-down companies, including Opendoor Technologies Inc., Kohl’s Corp. and Krispy Kreme Inc., fueled by a social-media buzz and a sudden surge of buying by retail investors.】

item.title: 谷歌获得 ServiceNow 12 亿美元云合同
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司与软件公司ServiceNow Inc.签署了一项价值超过10亿美元的协议，为其提供云计算服务。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google inked a deal worth more than $1 billion to provide cloud-computing services to software firm ServiceNow Inc., a win for Google Cloud’s efforts to get major enterprises onto its platform.】

item.title: Liberty Global 裁员，目标锁定企业级员工
item.description: 据知情人士透露，作为新重组计划的一部分，Liberty Global Ltd. 正在寻求裁减数百个工作岗位。【原文：Liberty Global Ltd. is looking to eliminate hundreds of jobs as part of a new restructuring program, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 小麦丰收对面临低价的美国农民来说喜忧参半
item.description: 北达科他州的麦田在去年创下历史纪录后，将再次迎来大丰收。这对吉姆-佩尔曼（Jim Pellman）这样的农民来说可谓喜忧参半，他们有大量的粮食可以出售，但价格却太低。【原文：North Dakota’s wheat fields are set to deliver another bumper crop after last year’s record. That’s a mixed blessing for farmers like Jim Pellman, providing plenty of grain to sell but at too-low prices.】

item.title: 笔记本电脑农场主的自白：一个美国人如何帮助朝鲜实施疯狂的远程工人计划
item.description:
数以千计的卧底特工从谷歌和亚马逊等公司那里获得数百万美元，为金正恩的火箭计划提供资金。在《布鲁姆伯格商业周刊》的独家报道中，金正恩政权的一名美国马前卒道出了一切。【原文：

Thousands of undercover agents feed Kim Jong Un’s rocket program with millions from the likes of Google and Amazon. In a Bloomberg Businessweek exclusive, one of the regime’s US pawns tells all.

】

item.title: 希斯称核心价格高企，墨西哥银行应维持关键利率不变
item.description: 墨西哥中央银行的一位高层决策者表示，7 月初墨西哥总体通胀率的放缓不足以成为下个月再次降息的理由。【原文：The slowdown in Mexico’s headline inflation rate in early July is not enough to warrant another interest rate cut next month, according to a top policymaker at the county’s central bank, who added that stubbornly high core inflation deserves more scrutiny.】

item.title: TechnipFMC预计将获得100亿美元海底订单，业绩大涨
item.description: 全球最大的近海石油装备制造商之一 TechnipFMC PLC 的股价飙升至十年来的最高点，原因是有迹象表明该公司前景强劲，凸显了该行业对海上生产的乐观态度。【原文：Shares of TechnipFMC PLC, one of the world’s biggest makers of offshore oil gear, surged to the highest in a decade on signs of a robust outlook that underscores the industry’s optimism over production at sea.】

item.title: 泰克在智利的最新挫折凸显铜供应困境
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）下调了其智利旗舰矿山的生产指标，这是这家加拿大公司加入铜业大联盟的努力遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd.’s lowered production guidance for its flagship Chilean mine in the latest setback to the Canadian company’s efforts to join the copper big leagues.】

item.title: PE 公司 GTCR 正在洽谈收购预付卡公司 Blackhawk
item.description: 据知情人士透露，GTCR 正在洽谈收购预付礼品卡供应商 Blackhawk Network。【原文：GTCR is in talks to acquire prepaid gift-card provider Blackhawk Network, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雪佛龙重返委内瑞拉将促进美国炼油商的供应
item.description: 美国政府决定允许雪佛龙公司恢复生产和出口委内瑞拉石油，这将使美国炼油厂的原油供应量每天增加 20 多万桶。尽管如此，对于燃料制造商来说，要在关键的夏季驾驶季节充分利用这一增长优势可能为时已晚。【原文：The US government’s decision to let Chevron Corp. resume producing and exporting Venezuelan oil is set to increase crude supplies for American refiners by more than 200,000 barrels a day. Still, it may be too late for fuelmakers to take full advantage of the boost during the key summer driving season.】

item.title: 比特币熊市高风险期权赌注：跌至 11 万美元
item.description: 一位加密货币投资者刚刚下了一个高风险赌注：比特币将在 8 月初下跌至少 8%，跌至 11 万美元以下。【原文：A crypto investor just made a high-stakes wager that Bitcoin will fall at least 8% to below $110,000 by early August.】

item.title: 华尔街波动率指标创下新低，交易员纷纷退缩
item.description: 周四，华尔街对未来一个月波动性的预期创下了自2月14日以来的最低水平，因为稳健的就业数据使股市接近历史高点。【原文：A measure of Wall Street’s expectations for volatility over the next month hit its lowest level since Feb. 14 on Thursday as stocks traded near all-time highs on solid jobs data.】

item.title: 企业信贷中缺失的中间环节
item.description:
缺失的中间。【原文：

The missing middle.

】

item.title: Cinven 主导对法国数据服务公司 Artefact 的竞购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Cinven 即将收购 Artefact，这笔交易对这家法国数据服务公司的估值约为 10 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：Cinven is nearing an acquisition of Artefact in a deal that could value the French data services company at about €1 billion ($1.2 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）新项目谈判将于八月启动，塞内加尔欧洲债券上涨
item.description: 塞内加尔欧元债券周四上涨，成为新兴市场中表现最好的债券之一，因为国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示将从下个月开始与塞内加尔讨论新的计划。【原文：Senegal eurobonds rose Thursday and were among the top performers in emerging markets as the International Monetary Fund said it will start discussions with the country on a new program from next month.】

item.title: 意大利火箭制造商阿维奥公司寻求在弗吉尼亚州进行新的太空发射
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利火箭制造商 Avio SpA 公司正在与美国政府商谈从弗吉尼亚州瓦勒普斯岛进行太空发射的事宜。【原文：Italian rocket maker Avio SpA is in talks with the US government to conduct space launches from Wallops Island in Virginia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 助手称，特朗普的人工智能计划旨在让美国制定全球标准
item.description: 白宫科技主任迈克尔-克拉齐奥斯（Michael Kratsios）表示，特朗普政府新的人工智能政策蓝图旨在让美国的技术成为全球人工智能的标准，让美国的盟友更容易获得关键的硬件和软件。【原文：The Trump administration’s new AI policy blueprint seeks to make American technology the standard for artificial intelligence globally by making it easier for US allies to acquire crucial hardware and software, according to White House science and technology director Michael Kratsios.】

item.title: 朝圣者公司斥资 4 亿美元新建预制食品工厂
item.description: Pilgrim's Pride 公司将投资 4 亿美元在佐治亚州新建一座工厂，这家鸡肉生产商正努力继续拓展调理食品业务。【原文：Pilgrim’s Pride Corp. will invest $400 million in a new facility in Georgia as the chicken producer seeks to continue its expansion in prepared foods.】

item.title: 美联储在特朗普来访前组织媒体参观翻新现场
item.description: 美联储工作人员带领记者参观了耗资 25 亿美元的央行总部翻修工程，此时距离唐纳德-特朗普总统将参观这个被他及其盟友抨击为浪费和奢侈的项目还有几个小时。【原文：Federal Reserve staff led reporters on a tour of the $2.5 billion renovation of the central bank’s headquarters, hours before President Donald Trump is set to visit the project he and his allies have slammed as wasteful and extravagant.】

item.title: 科尔百货正在缩小部分婴儿反斗城商店的规模
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，科尔公司（Kohl's Corp.【原文：Kohl’s Corp. is shrinking the size of its Babies “R” Us shops at some locations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 玻利维亚总统选举前美元平行汇率下跌
item.description: 由于民调显示右翼候选人可能在 8 月的总统选举中获胜，玻利维亚黑市上的美元价格本周跌至 14 玻利维亚诺，创下近三个月来的最低价位。【原文：The price of the dollar on Bolivia’s black market dropped to 14 bolivianos this week, the weakest in almost three months, as polls signal a right-wing candidate could win the presidential election in August.】

item.title: Indeed 表示，超过 40% 的美国人看到实际薪酬下降
item.description: 根据求职公司 Indeed 的数据，超过 40% 的美国工人的薪水落后于通胀率，而受到挤压的可能是中低收入者。【原文：Paychecks for more than 40% of American workers are lagging the rate of inflation, and it’s likely middle- and lower-earners who are getting squeezed, according to job-search firm Indeed.】
